text: Adam Randle Bass (born July 31, 1981 in Kokomo, Indiana) is an American former baseball player who played in Japan. ==Biography== Bass attended high school at Madison Academy, and played college baseball at the University of Alabama in Huntsville. In 2002, he played collegiate summer baseball with the Hyannis Mets of the Cape Cod Baseball League. Bass was selected by the Arizona Diamondbacks in the 10th round of the 2003 MLB Draft. In 2007, he played for the Japan Pacific League with the Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles. ==References== Category:Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles players Category:American expatriate baseball players in Japan Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Sportspeople from Kokomo, Indiana Category:Alabama–Huntsville Chargers baseball players Category:Hyannis Harbor Hawks players Category:Baseball players from Indiana
title: Adam Bass
